hero.title: Premium Agricultural Products
hero.subtitle: Connecting farms to markets with quality grains, seeds, fruits, and vegetables. Your trusted partner in sustainable agriculture.

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: Al Hikma Agro is a leading agricultural products company dedicated to providing premium quality grains, seeds, fruits, and vegetables to customers worldwide. With years of experience and a commitment to sustainable farming practices, we bridge the gap between farmers and global markets.

quality.title: Quality Assured
quality.desc: Rigorous quality control and certification processes

global.title: Global Reach
global.desc: Serving customers worldwide with reliable supply chains

leader.title: Industry Leader
leader.desc: Recognized excellence in agricultural product distribution

products.title: Featured Products
products.subtitle: Discover our premium selection of agricultural products

featuredProducts.name: Organic Vegetables
featuredProducts.description: Organic Vegetables are grown naturally without the use of harmful pesticides, chemical fertilizers, or genetically modified seeds. Cultivated in healthy soil with sustainable farming practices, they are rich in nutrients, full of natural flavor, and safe for the whole family. Our organic vegetables are harvested fresh from the farm, ensuring quality, purity, and the goodness of nature in every bite. By choosing organic, you not only care for your health but also support eco-friendly farming that protects the environment.

featuredProducts.name: Organic Cattle Farm
featuredProducts.description: Organic Cattle Farm is dedicated to raising healthy, grass-fed cows in a natural and sustainable environment. Our cattle are nurtured with care, free from harmful chemicals, hormones, and antibiotics. We believe in pure farming practices that protect nature, ensure animal well-being, and deliver high-quality organic dairy and meat products. With fresh green pastures and a commitment to sustainability, we bring you the true taste of nature—safe, nutritious, and wholesome.

featuredProducts.name: Organic Fruits
featuredProducts.description: Our Organic Fruits are grown with love and care in fertile orchards, without synthetic pesticides, chemical fertilizers, or artificial ripening agents. Fresh, juicy, and naturally sweet, they are packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. From mangoes to papayas, bananas to guavas, each fruit is handpicked at peak ripeness to ensure the best flavor and nutrition. Choosing our organic fruits means choosing health, freshness, and the pure goodness of nature.

company.name: Al Hikma Agro
company.description: Leading provider of premium agricultural products, committed to sustainable farming practices and delivering quality grains, seeds, fruits, and vegetables worldwide.

about.title: About Al Hikma Agro
about.subtitle: We believe that sustainable agriculture is the key to the future. Our goal is to work hand in hand with farmers and connect their premium quality products to global markets. Through innovative solutions and creative thinking, we aim to make farming easier, more productive, and more profitable.

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: Founded in 2010, Al Hikma Agro began as a small family business with a big vision: to revolutionize the agricultural supply chain by connecting quality farmers with global markets. Over the years, we have grown into a leading agricultural products company, serving customers across six continents.
story.para2: Our expertise spans across grains, seeds, fruits, vegetables, and organic fertilizers. We work directly with farmers to ensure sustainable farming practices while maintaining the highest quality standards for our products.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be the world's most trusted agricultural products company, leading the transformation towards sustainable farming practices and ensuring food security for future generations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To provide premium quality agricultural products while supporting sustainable farming practices, empowering farmers, and delivering exceptional value to our customers worldwide.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: Key milestones in our growth and development

organic.title: Organic Farming
organic.desc: We partner with certified organic farms that use natural fertilizers and pest control methods, ensuring chemical-free products.
organic.impact: 85% of our products are organically certified

water.title: Water Conservation
water.desc: Advanced irrigation systems and water recycling programs help our partner farms reduce water consumption by up to 40%.

waste.title: Waste Reduction
waste.desc: Comprehensive recycling programs and biodegradable packaging materials minimize our environmental footprint.

renewable.title: Renewable Energy
renewable.desc: Solar panels and wind energy power our facilities, reducing carbon emissions and promoting clean energy adoption.

pest.title: Integrated Pest Management
pest.desc: Natural pest control methods that protect crops while preserving beneficial insects

crop.title: Crop Rotation Programs
crop.desc: Strategic crop rotation to maintain soil fertility and prevent disease

biodiversity.title: Biodiversity Conservation
biodiversity.desc: Protecting native species and promoting ecological balance in farming areas

tomatoes.name: Fresh Tomatoes
tomatoes.desc: Farm-fresh tomatoes packed with flavor and nutrients. Ideal for restaurants and food processing.

cornSeeds.name: Corn Seeds
cornSeeds.desc: High-yield corn seeds for optimal crop production. Disease-resistant and climate-adapted varieties.

apples.name: Organic Apples
apples.desc: Crisp, sweet organic apples grown with care. Perfect for fresh consumption and processing.

bioFertilizer.name: Bio Fertilizer
bioFertilizer.desc: Eco-friendly fertilizer for sustainable farming. Improves soil health and crop yields naturally.

carrots.name: Organic Carrots
carrots.desc: Fresh organic carrots rich in beta-carotene. Grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.

sunflowerSeeds.name: Sunflower Seeds
sunflowerSeeds.desc: High-quality sunflower seeds for oil production. Excellent germination rate and oil content.

bananas.name: Organic Bananas
bananas.desc: Sweet, ripe organic bananas. Sustainably grown and fair-trade certified. Fresh banana from our garden.

compost.name: Organic Compost
compost.desc: Premium organic compost made from natural materials. Enhances soil structure and fertility.

bellPeppers.name: Bell Peppers
bellPeppers.desc: Colorful bell peppers with excellent flavor and nutritional value. Available in multiple colors.

rohita.name: Fresh Rohita Fish
rohita.desc: Premium wild-caught Fresh Rohita Fish, rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Sustainably sourced and flash-frozen for freshness.

tilapia.name: Organic Farm-Raised Tilapia
tilapia.desc: Organically raised tilapia from certified sustainable farms. Mild flavor and excellent protein source.

beef.name: Grass-Fed Beef
beef.desc: Premium grass-fed beef from pasture-raised cattle. No hormones or antibiotics, rich marbling and exceptional taste.
